title: Bug 122584: Cascading parameter values cannot be displayed properly in HTML viewer.
description: Description: Cascading parameter values cannot be displayed properly in the HTML viewer.
OB: When previewing the attached design file in the HTML viewer and clicking on the 'change parameter' button, the second parameter value in the same cascading parameter group is not displayed.
EB: Expect that when the first parameter value is selected, the second parameter value in the same cascading parameter group should be displayed.
SR: Steps to reproduce: 1. Open the attached design file in the HTML viewer. 2. Click on the 'change parameter' button in the HTML viewer.
